mapper.insert: insert into vcd.hire(Vno, Cno, Hprice, Hamount, Htime, Rtime, Hstatus) VALUES (#{Hire.Vno},#{Hire.Cno},#{Hire.Hprice},#{Hire.Hamount},#{Hire.Htime,jdbcType=DATE},#{Hire.Rtime,jdbcType=DATE},'borrowed');
mapper.update: update vcd.hire set Hprice = #{Hire.Hprice}, Hamount = #{Hire.Hamount}, Htime = #{Hire.Htime,jdbcType=DATE}, Rtime = #{Hire.Rtime,jdbcType=DATE}, Hstatus = $(Hire.Hstatus? 'borrowed' : 'returned') where Vno = #{Hire.Vno} and Cno = #{Hire.Cno};
